title: A Kingdom of Mischief & Memories
description: Before the Forge, there was nothing.After the Forge, there is nothing. Who will the healer become?Gifted with the ability to heal, Maeve serves her small village at the town Apothecary that she runs with those whom she calls her family. Her duty is to heal, to help others. But her power is too great for such a simple life. As easily as she mends, she can break. Becoming the Sergeant helbredera, she harnesses her Gift and uses it to help others while answering to a mysterious green-eyed General, Hagan. Surrounded by new and exciting friends and enemies, she learns of the power that rules the Five Fae Kingdoms and the tyrants who lead them. Powers that far outrank her own. Rebellion is brewing amongst the Freed Fae, while the Second Kingdom protects their land to any end - even if their methods are cruel and unsavory. In her sleep, when she closes her eyes, she sees him and the secrets he may hold. Hagan awakens things inside of her she had never known, feelings that make her question everything about herself, him, and her service to the King of Thunder.Love and electricity build into something new and old, before and after. As if the writing of their Forged Fate demanded it. When secrets and memories collide, Maeve will have to discover both who she is and who she wants to become.
author: Shelby Cuaron
